subject: Reply to your querry's
body:
Dear Edward,

It is my pleasure to reply to your inquiry line by line and in blue colour
so as not to miss anything.

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my pending contract payment. I
appreciate your willingness to assist me in resolving this matter. Can you
please provide me with more information about the African Bank ADB and its
role in facilitating the payment?

I want you to know that all central banks of member states are affiliated
to African Development Bank (ADB) as banks in different member states align
with their central banks so our mandate goes a long way to source the root
of your transactions through central banks of member states, the amount
involved and why your funds have not reached you till date.

We can go a long way to call the money back wherever it is located in the
world because we have the mandate of the African Union (AU) which is an
affiliate of the United Nations (UN).

You have to cooperate with us if not we cannot be able to help you. The
first step is to send a questionnaire to you to test and know if you are
really the owner of the fund and to know your last communication with the
paying bank.

The earlier you believe what I am telling you and start cooperating the
better and easier for both of us. I am in the introductory part of my
assistance to you.



Additionally, I would like to understand how the CEO of ADB will be
involved in the process and what percentage he expects in return for his
assistance. Could you please clarify this for me?
He is directly involved because he was given the mandate by the African
Union (AU) to investigate numerous reports of mis-appropriations of funds
involving contract payment and other businesses that their beneficiary have
not received their payments due to one problem or the other, especially
cases involving private and central banks of member states. He recruited us
as a team so we are working for the same purpose and we are achieving
results.

He cannot propose this to you directly, I know if you offer him 10% of the
total sum he will go for it and help you get your approval and payment, but
this has to be confidential (hope you understand this?)

Furthermore, I am curious about the UK Debt Management Office's role in
transferring the funds directly to my account. How does this process work,
and what guarantees do I have that the funds will indeed be transferred
successfully?

After our inquiries and investigations, we shall report to the CEO and will
in turn give approval to it and then forward it to the ADB office in the
UK. This is where you will receive your payment from. It shall be so
because we don’t want anything to be a hitch within Africa again.

Lastly, I understand that you mentioned a need for compensation for your
assistance. While I appreciate your efforts, could you please explain
further what kind of compensation you are expecting? It would be helpful to
have a clear understanding of what is required.

I am handling your case and off course I will expect you to appreciate me
after you have received your payment. I hope to have explained very well to
you, if there is anything still not clear to you do ask me and I will be
honoured to give you a reply.

Have a good and wonderful day.

Your faithfully,

Alain Coulibaly (Office of the CEO. IRTD. ADB).

subject: Re: Reply to your querry's
body:
Dear Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing me with more information about the African Bank ADB and its role in my pending contract payment. I appreciate your efforts to assist me in resolving this matter.

I understand that the African Bank ADB is affiliated with all central banks of member states, and its mandate involves sourcing the root cause of delayed payments through these central banks. It's reassuring to know that you have the mandate of the African Union AU, which is an affiliate of the United Nations UN, to help retrieve funds wherever they may be located.

In order to proceed, you mentioned that I need to cooperate with you by providing some information. Could you please clarify what specific information you require from me? I want to ensure that I am providing the correct details.

Regarding the involvement of the CEO of ADB, it's interesting to hear that he has been given a mandate by the African Union AU to address cases involving delayed payments. However, I would like further clarification on what percentage he expects in return for his assistance. Understanding this will help me assess the feasibility of moving forward.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will play a role in transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed be transferred successfully? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this aspect.

Lastly, while I appreciate your efforts in handling my case, could you please provide further details on what kind of appreciation or compensation you are expecting? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thank you once again for your assistance and prompt replies. I look forward to receiving your clarifications.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Reply to more queries
body:
Hello Edward,

In continuation I will continue to respond to your queries in blue colour.

In order to proceed, you mentioned that I need to cooperate with you by
providing some information. Could you please clarify what specific
information you require from me? I want to ensure that I am providing the
correct details.



This has to be information about yourself  and the fund, I will send you a
form that you will fill and return back to us on Monday.

Regarding the involvement of the CEO of ADB, it's interesting to hear that
he has been given a mandate by the African Union AU to address cases
involving delayed payments. However, I would like further clarification on
what percentage he expects in return for his assistance. Understanding this
will help me assess the feasibility of moving forward.

I told you that he and his colleagues will take 10% of the total sum, this
will be after you have received your funds. He will give you an account
where you will pay in the agreed sum.


You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will play a role in
transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how
this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed
be transferred successfully? It's important for me to have a clear
understanding of this aspect.



It is from ADB headquarters in Abidjan, Cote d’Ivoire that they will
receive instructions to transfer your sum to you. Their work is to wire
money to you by TT no more no less, all the work has to be done here.

Lastly, while I appreciate your efforts in handling my case, could you
please provide further details on what kind of appreciation or compensation
you are expecting? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding
so that we can proceed accordingly.



Ah you will show me appreciation by giving me a cash gift, any amount you
think is good for me will be appreciated.

Hope to have informed you well. You should expect the form by Monday
morning.

Have a very good weekend.

Alain Coulibaly

subject: Re: Reply to more queries
body:
Hello Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to provide further information. 

Regarding the form that you mentioned, could you please explain what kind of details it requires? I want to make sure that I am filling it out correctly.

I understand that the CEO of ADB and his colleagues will take a percentage of the total sum after I have received my funds. Could you please clarify what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the feasibility of moving forward.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will be involved in transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed be transferred? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this aspect.

Lastly, you mentioned that there is an expectation for a cash gift or donation. Could you please provide more details on what kind of gift or donation is expected? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving the form on Monday morning.

Have a great weekend!

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: See attachement for the form
body:
Dear Edward,

Hope you had a pleasant weekend.

 I have given answers to most of your questions before, I don’t why you are
repeating the same questions again and again.

Regarding the form that you mentioned, could you please explain what kind
of details it requires? I want to make sure that I am filling it out
correctly.

There is nothing difficult in the form, fill it and return to us, If there
is anything you don’t understand, ask questions.

I understand that the CEO of ADB and his colleagues will take a percentage
of the total sum after I have received my funds. Could you please clarify
what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the feasibility of
moving forward.

The CEO who is my boss with his group will take 10% of the total sum, I
have said this in the past. You have to accept it.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will be involved in
transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how
this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed
be transferred? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this
aspect.

I have told you that everything will be concluded here, they will only
receive instruction from ADB headquarters to affect the transfer of money
to an account that the head office will be given to them. On your side you
have nothing to discuss with them unless they will ask you to re-confirm
your account information. We are using our UK office because of its
location in the first world where electronic transactions are efficient and
goes without interruptions or failures from networks.

Lastly, you mentioned that there is an expectation for a cash gift or
donation. Could you please provide more details on what kind of gift or
donation is expected? It would be helpful for me to have a clear
understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

I said you will compensate me, meaning that I will expect a monetary gift
from you at the end of the transaction, this has to be voluntarily.
Whatever you give I will take it with a big thank you.

You can see in attachment a form that you are going to fill with
information relating to yourself your transaction history and your funds.

Fill this form accordingly and return it to us.

If there is any extra information you have, you can give it through mails.

We cannot do any other thing unless you return the questionnaire sent to you

You are to include the following also:

1). The name of the company you used to secure the contract

2). Your company account information as at the time of executing the
contract.

3). Copy of your company certificate of incorporation

4). Copy of your International passport, Id card or driving license (any of
these documents is to be used for cross checking).

If you have the ‘contract award certificate’ of the contract or any
document issued to you from the company in relation to this contract and
any document issued to you from their paying bank. Even if your case is not
about a contract, send us the documents you have in relation to your
transactions, especially documents issued by Banks.

We are expecting you to return this form as soon as possible.

Your faithfully,

Alain Coulibaly (Office of the CEO. IRTD. ADB).

subject: Re: Reply to more queries
body:

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to provide further information. 

Regarding the form that you mentioned, could you please explain what kind of details it requires? I want to make sure that I am filling it out correctly.

I understand that the CEO of ADB and his colleagues will take a percentage of the total sum after I have received my funds. Could you please clarify what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the feasibility of moving forward.

Have a great weekend!

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: Reply to more queries
body:

I have sent the form to you since monday and am expecting you to write

subject: See attachement for the form
body:
* resend the form again in case you did not get it. Maybe it was in spam. *
Dear Edward,

Hope you had a pleasant weekend.

 I have given answers to most of your questions before, I don’t why you are
repeating the same questions again and again.

Regarding the form that you mentioned, could you please explain what kind
of details it requires? I want to make sure that I am filling it out
correctly.

There is nothing difficult in the form, fill it and return to us, If there
is anything you don’t understand, ask questions.

I understand that the CEO of ADB and his colleagues will take a percentage
of the total sum after I have received my funds. Could you please clarify
what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the feasibility of
moving forward.

The CEO who is my boss with his group will take 10% of the total sum, I
have said this in the past. You have to accept it.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will be involved in
transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how
this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed
be transferred? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this
aspect.

I have told you that everything will be concluded here, they will only
receive instruction from ADB headquarters to affect the transfer of money
to an account that the head office will be given to them. On your side you
have nothing to discuss with them unless they will ask you to re-confirm
your account information. We are using our UK office because of its
location in the first world where electronic transactions are efficient and
goes without interruptions or failures from networks.

Lastly, you mentioned that there is an expectation for a cash gift or
donation. Could you please provide more details on what kind of gift or
donation is expected? It would be helpful for me to have a clear
understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

I said you will compensate me, meaning that I will expect a monetary gift
from you at the end of the transaction, this has to be voluntarily.
Whatever you give I will take it with a big thank you.

You can see in attachment a form that you are going to fill with
information relating to yourself your transaction history and your funds.

Fill this form accordingly and return it to us.

If there is any extra information you have, you can give it through mails.

We cannot do any other thing unless you return the questionnaire sent to you

You are to include the following also:

1). The name of the company you used to secure the contract

2). Your company account information as at the time of executing the
contract.

3). Copy of your company certificate of incorporation

4). Copy of your International passport, Id card or driving license (any of
these documents is to be used for cross checking).

If you have the ‘contract award certificate’ of the contract or any
document issued to you from the company in relation to this contract and
any document issued to you from their paying bank. Even if your case is not
about a contract, send us the documents you have in relation to your
transactions, especially documents issued by Banks.

We are expecting you to return this form as soon as possible.

Your faithfully,

Alain Coulibaly (Office of the CEO. IRTD. ADB).

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
Dear Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for your email. I hope you had a great weekend as well. I apologize if my questions seemed repetitive, I just want to make sure I have a clear understanding of everything.

Regarding the form, could you please provide more details on what kind of information it requires? I want to ensure that I fill it out correctly and provide the necessary details.

I understand that the CEO and his colleagues will take a percentage of the total sum once I receive my funds. Could you please clarify what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the situation and understand how much I will receive.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will be involved in transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you explain how this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed be transferred? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this aspect.

Lastly, you mentioned an expectation for a cash gift or donation. Could you please provide more details on what kind of gift or donation is expected? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

I appreciate your assistance in providing these clarifications. Once I have all the necessary information, I will fill out the form and return it to you as soon as possible.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: See attachement for the form
body:
Hello Mr. Edward,

You can see in attachment the form you are to fill.

There is nothing difficult in the form, fill it and return to us, If there
is anything you don’t understand, ask questions.

We are going to use the information’s provided by you to compare with the
ones we have and see if you are the rightful owner of the fund.

The CEO who is my boss with his group will take 10% of the total sum, I
have said this in the past. You have to accept he take 10% of the total sum
of 35.500.000 which is the amount involved.

I have told you that everything will be concluded here, they will only
receive instruction from ADB headquarters to affect the transfer of money
to an account that the head office will be given to them. On your side you
have nothing to discuss with them unless they will ask you to re-confirm
your account information. We are using our UK office because of its
location in the first world where electronic transactions are efficient and
goes without interruptions or failures from networks.

I said you will compensate me, meaning that I will expect a monetary gift
from you at the end of the transaction, this has to be voluntarily.
Whatever you give I will take it with a big thank you. Gift has no price
what ever you decide to give me will be accepted.

You can see in attachment a form that you are going to fill with
information relating to yourself your transaction history and your funds.

Fill this form accordingly and return it to us.

If there is any extra information you have, you can give it through mails.

We cannot do any other thing unless you return the questionnaire sent to you

You are to include the following also:

1). The name of the company you used to secure the contract

2). Your company account information as at the time of executing the
contract.

3). Copy of your company certificate of incorporation

4). Copy of your International passport, Id card or driving license (any of
these documents is to be used for cross checking).

If you have the ‘contract award certificate’ of the contract or any
document issued to you from the company in relation to this contract and
any document issued to you from their paying bank. Even if your case is not
about a contract, send us the documents you have in relation to your
transactions, especially documents issued by Banks.

We are expecting you to return this form as soon as possible.

Your faithfully,

Alain Coulibaly (Office of the CEO. IRTD. ADB).

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
Hello Mr. Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I received the form you mentioned in the attachment. I have a few questions before I fill it out.

1. Could you please provide more details about the purpose of this form? What specific information are you looking for?

2. You mentioned that the CEO and his group will take care of the total sum involved. Can you clarify what exactly they will be doing with the funds?

3. You mentioned that everything will be concluded on your end and that I don't need to discuss anything with anyone else unless asked to provide my account details. Can you explain why my account details would be needed?

4. You mentioned that your UK office is being used because of its efficient electronic networks. Can you tell me more about why this location is important for the transfer of funds?

5. Lastly, you mentioned that I would need to compensate you at the end of this process. Could you please explain what this compensation is for and how it is determined?

I appreciate your assistance in clarifying these points before I proceed further.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
1. Could you please provide more details about the purpose of this form?
What specific information are you looking for?.

*This form is going to contain information provided by you directly, we
shall use it to compare  the information we have about you, compare and
contrast to make sure we are dealing with the original owner of the funds*



2. You mentioned that the CEO and his group will take care of the total sum
involved. Can you clarify what exactly they will be doing with the funds?.

*If the funds is yours they will approve the release to you through the
account you will provide. There is no other way of taking care of it.*

3. You mentioned that everything will be concluded on your end and that I
don't need to discuss anything with anyone else unless asked to provide my
account details. Can you explain why my account details would be needed?.

*I said unless they will ask you to confirm your account which you will
state in the form sent to you. Your account will be needed to transfer your
money by TT wire transfer.*

4. You mentioned that your UK office is being used because of its efficient
electronic networks. Can you tell me more about why this location is
important for the transfer of funds?.

*Africa is a third world continent, thing are not stable here and UK is a
first world country where everything is almost stable and perfect. This is
why UK location is used for this. *

5. Lastly, you mentioned that I would need to compensate you at the end of
this process. Could you please explain what this compensation is for and
how it is determined?

*This will be out of your willing, If you decide to give me , whatever you
give will be accepted.. This is if you think I deserve to be given
something.*
Thanks
Alain Coulibaly.

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
Hello Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for providing more details about the purpose of this form. I appreciate your explanation. It seems like the form is being used to verify my identity and ensure that I am the original owner of the funds. That makes sense.

I also understand that if the funds are indeed mine, they will be released to me through the account I provide. So, just to clarify, once my account details are confirmed, the funds will be transferred to me via TT wire transfer, correct?

You mentioned that your UK office is being used because of its efficient electronic networks. I can see why stability and efficiency would be important for such a transaction. It's interesting how different regions have varying levels of stability in their systems.

Lastly, you mentioned that there might be compensation for me at the end of this process. Could you please explain what this compensation is for and how it is determined? I'm curious to know more about it.

Thank you again for taking the time to answer my questions.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
Yes you will receive your fund by TT wire transfer into your account.
Compensation will be for me not you.
You are the person that will compensate me with whatever amount you think
is due for me.
Thanks.

subject: Give me your phone/whatsapp no.
body:
This is my Phone/whatsapp number, you can contact me through it i case of
anything.
+229 61326109
You can give me yours as well.
Thanks.

subject: Re: Give me your phone/whatsapp no.
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing your phone number. I appreciate your willingness to connect. However, I prefer not to share my personal contact information at this time. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss or share?

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
You are not eligible yet, rather we are working to make you eligible. This
is why you have to provide us all the information needed from you, but if
you think you know better than us you can continue doing things your way.
Thanks.

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:

Could you please provide me with more information about what exactly I need to do in order to become eligible? I want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

Edward

Without it we cannot do anything.
Thanks.

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. Could you please provide me with more details about the form you mentioned? What kind of information does it require? And how will returning the form benefit me? I just want to make sure I understand the process correctly before proceeding. Thank you!

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: I have answered all your questions
body:
Hello Sir,

The form in question is before you, you have seen the contents and what is
required for you to fill. Look into the form to ask me questions about
anything that you do not understand.

I have told you that the form will contain the information you provide, My
boss will study it and give approval for the release of your funds to you,
it will be beneficial to you because it will enable the bank to release
your funds to you.

I think you have asked enough questions and have understood the process
correctly.

You can fill the form and return it to us.
Thanks,

Alain Coulibaly

subject: Re: I have answered all your questions
body:
Hello Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to provide information and assist me with the form. Before I proceed, could you please clarify what funds exactly are being referred to? Is this related to a specific transaction or account?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the approval process. Who is your boss and how long does it usually take for the funds to be released once the form is filled and returned?

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: I have answered all your questions
body:
Hello Mr. Edward,

The Funds meant for the payment of the supply of oil pipelines and
accessories. The account you will provide is where it will be paid into.

There is nothing to worry about, I will work to your favour.

Fill the form and send if it is not well filled, I will tell you what to
change.
Thanks,

Alain Coulibaly.

subject: Re: I have answered all your questions
body:
Hello Mr. Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your message regarding the funds for the payment of the oil pipelines supply. Could you please provide me with more details about this opportunity? I would like to understand how it will work in my favor.

Also, could you explain what form you are referring to? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: I have answered all your questions
body:
You are the person who supplied this product as stated in the contact given
to our office.
Your contacts were given to us so if we pay to the person whose contact was
given to our bank, we did not make any mistake. Remember we contacted you
and we did not make mistakes.
The form I am talking about is the one I sent to you to fill and return to
us.
Thanks.

subject: Re: I have answered all your questions
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if there was any confusion, but I'm not sure I understand what product or contact you are referring to. Could you please provide more details about the specific situation and the form you mentioned? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Edward

Thank you for reaching out to me. I apologize if there was any confusion, but I'm not sure I understand what product or contact you are referring to. Could you please provide more details about the specific situation and the form you mentioned? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding before proceeding.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could clarify how exactly we can assist you. Feel free to share any additional information or questions you may have, and I'll do my best to help.

Thank you again for reaching out, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Edward

body:
Dear Alain Coulibaly,

Thank you for your response. I apologize if my questions seemed repetitive, I just wanted to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Regarding the form, could you please provide more details on what specific information it requires? I want to ensure that I fill it out correctly and provide all the necessary details.

I understand that the CEO and his colleagues will take a percentage of the total sum once I receive my funds. Could you please clarify what percentage they expect? This will help me assess the feasibility of moving forward.

You mentioned that the UK Debt Management Office will be involved in transferring the funds directly into my account. Can you please explain how this process works and what guarantees there are that the funds will indeed be transferred? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of this aspect.

Lastly, you mentioned an expectation for a cash gift or donation. Could you please provide more details on what kind of gift or donation is expected? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding so that we can proceed accordingly.

I appreciate your assistance in providing these clarifications. Once I have all the necessary information, I will proceed with filling out the form and returning it to you as soon as possible.

Best wishes,
Edward

subject: Re: See attachement for the form

subject: Re: See attachement for the form
body:
I am sure you have gone through the form. ask me questions from the form
and its  contents.

The form is your information and what you know about the funds. I told you
to fill it and submit it to me first, I will study it before sending it to
my boss. If there is anything not correct, I will tell you and you will put
it right.

The committee is going to study it and give a report on whether you merit
the funds or you will lose it.

You will lose the funds if you did not provide the right information, this
is why I request you to send it to me first after filling.
Thanks,

Ms. Amira Youseouf.
